/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[SP_Automatic_CuratedView]    Script Date: 12/19/2022 9:24:41 PM ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO

SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO





CREATE OR ALTER            PROCEDURE [dbo].[SP_Automatic_CuratedView]
(

    @Table_Name varchar(200)='Dim_Business',
	@ADLS_Folder Varchar(200)='Notification_DataMart',
	@Schema_Name varchar(50)='Notification',
	@File_Format varchar(50)=null,
	@Data_Source_Path Nvarchar(max)='https://wsentdatalakedev002.dfs.core.windows.net',--/curated/Notification_DataMart',
	@DataLake_Zone varchar(50) ='curated',
	@Format_Type varchar(50)='DELTA'
	--execute [dbo].[SP_Automatic_CuratedReview] 'Dim_Business','Notification_DataMart'
	
)
AS
BEGIN
  SET NOCOUNT ON
  
Begin

	Declare @SQLQuery NVARCHAR(MAX)=''


	SET @SQLQuery =
	'CREATE OR ALTER VIEW  ' + @Schema_Name+'.'+@Table_Name +' AS
   SELECT 
  *
   FROM

       OPENROWSET (
	        BULK '+''''+@Data_Source_Path+'/'+@DataLake_Zone+'/'+@ADLS_Folder+'/'+@Table_Name+'/'',
		  FORMAT = '+''''+@Format_Type+'''
		  ) AS [result]'
EXEC  (@SQLQuery)
END
END
GO
